short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces lonely single digits with words in HTML textareas

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces single-digit numbers within text in an HTML textarea (e.g. multiline text) as you type. Any single digit surrounded by spaces will be altered to its word form in English.
This is helpful when following a writing style guide with such a specification.
